Title: High Heels
Actors: Victoria Abril, Marisa Paredes, Miguel Bosé, Anna Lizaran
Plot: A girl's mother returns after 15 years to find her daughter has married one of her (the mother's) old boyfriends. They try to mend their broken mother/daughter relationship and deal with their common lover.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 11 wins & 8 nominations.
